d1e17.d: Into the Woods One day, what seemed like just another ordinary day turned out to be much more than that. Maurice gets lost on his way to a fair and ends up coming across the castle where the beast lives. Due to bad weather, he decides to take cover inside. Unaware that the ...

d1e24.d: Welcome! Come along with me as I tell a tale as old as time. It is the story of Belle, a hidden gem in a small village, and how crossing paths with a lonesome beast changed her life in a way she never would have imagined.
